      • buildConnection

        public static javax.net.ssl.HttpsURLConnection buildConnection(java.lang.String address)
        Builds a connection to TAXII server
        Parameters:
        address - String containing the address to build the connection to
        Returns:
        HttpsURLConnection object connected to TAXII server

      • discoveryResponse

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document discoveryResponse(java.lang.String msgId,
                                                     java.lang.String iRT,
                                                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<com.bcmcgroup.taxii11.ServiceInstance> serviceList)
        Constructs a TAXII Discovery_Response XML message and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        iRT - the in_response_to attribute
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        serviceList - an ArrayList containing ServiceInstance objects
        Returns:
        a Document object representing a TAXII Discovery Response Usage Example: Document dr = discoveryResponse("12345", "67890", null);

      • getServiceList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<com.bcmcgroup.taxii11.ServiceInstance> getServiceList()
        Get Service Instance List for Discovery_Response
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of service instances

      • inboxMessage

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document inboxMessage(java.lang.String msgId,
                                                java.lang.String resultId,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                                                java.lang.String destCollectionName,
                                                java.lang.String message,
                                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> sourceSubscription,
                                                com.bcmcgroup.taxii11.TaxiiUtil.RecordCount recordCount,
                                                java.util.List<ContentBlock> contentBlocks)
        Constructs a TAXII Inbox_Message XML message and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        resultId - the result_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers
        destCollectionName - the destination collection name
        message - text for the Message tag
        sourceSubscription - a HashMap containing all Source_Subscription attributes and tags (collection_name, Subscription_ID, Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp, Inclusive_End_Timestamp)
        recordCount - a RecordCount object containing info for the Record_Count tag
        contentBlocks - an ArrayList of ContentBlock objects
        Returns:
        a Document object representing a TAXII Inbox Message Usage Example: Document im = inboxMessage("12345", null, "Here is my message", null, contentBlocks);

      • pollRequest

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document pollRequest(java.lang.String msgId,
                                               java.lang.String cN,
                                               java.lang.String subId,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                                               java.lang.String ebt,
                                               java.lang.String iet)
        Constructs a TAXII Poll_Request XML message (with Subscription_ID) and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        cN - the collection name
        subId - the subscription_id
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        ebt - the Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp value
        iet - the Inclusive_End_Timestamp value
        Returns:
        a Document object representing a TAXII Poll request Usage Example: Document pr = pollRequest("12345", "myCollection", "12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef", null, "2014-05-24T22:23:00.000000Z", null);

      • pollRequest

        public static org.w3c.dom.Document pollRequest(java.lang.String msgId,
                                               java.lang.String cN,
                                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> extHdrs,
                                               java.lang.String ebt,
                                               java.lang.String iet,
                                               TaxiiUtil.PollParameters pp)
        Constructs a TAXII Poll_Request XML message (with Poll_Parameters) and returns the Document object
        Parameters:
        msgId - the message_id
        cN - the collection name
        extHdrs - a HashMap containing all extended headers (can be null)
        ebt - the Exclusive_Begin_Timestamp value
        iet - the Inclusive_End_Timestamp value
        pp - Poll parameters to be used
        Returns:
        a Document object representing a TAXII Poll Request
